projectName: Lagunita Health Club - Gym Booking App
description: A web application for Lagunita Health Club gym in Venezuela that allows users to view weekly class schedules and book spots in fitness classes. The app is entirely in Spanish.

features.name: Class Schedule View
features.description: Users can view gym classes organized by day of the week (Lunes through Sábado). Each day shows available classes with name, time, instructor, and capacity.

features.name: Class Booking
features.description: Users can book a spot in a class by clicking 'Reservar Cupo', entering their name and email, and submitting the form. A success message confirms the booking.

features.name: Hero Section
features.description: The schedule page features a hero section with the gym logo, tagline 'Tu bienestar empieza aquí', and stats showing 6 Días, 23 Clases, and 8 Disciplinas.

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: An admin interface at /admin for managing classes - adding, editing, and deleting classes for each day of the week.

pages.name: Schedule Page
pages.description: Main page showing hero section and class schedule with day selector

pages.name: Admin Dashboard
pages.description: Hidden admin page for managing gym classes
